radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up 3 weeks after initial scan: hyperintense (T2-weighted imaging) lesions in temporal, parietal, and insular cortex and midbrain; spine not affected.
10 days after initial scan: hyperintense (T2-weighted imaging), partly symmetric lesions in temporal, parietal, and frontal cortex, basal ganglia, and brainstem; spine not affected.
6 days after initial scan: meningeal contrast enhancement; spine not affected.
